meaningMnemonic: A <radical>mountain</radical> <radical>stone</radical> is probably going to be a really big stone. We're talking about a <kanji>boulder</kanji> here.
readingMnemonic: "<kanji>Boulder</kanji>!!!" yells a voice from behind you. "<reading>Eek, wha</reading>...?" (いわ) you reply. You look up to see a boulder falling off the cliff above you. "Eeeeeek! Whaaaat!?," you shout again, running and screaming this time.
